title: "Galactic Splendor"
content:
# Galactic Splendor

Galactic Splendor is a website dedicated to bringing you the beauty and wonder of the universe. Our main feature is a stunning photograph of a galaxy cluster, which serves as the centerpiece of our site. 

But we're more than just a pretty picture! Our site offers a wealth of information about space and astronomy, from the latest news and discoveries to educational resources for students and teachers. We also have a community section where you can connect with other space enthusiasts and share your own experiences and knowledge.

At Galactic Splendor, we believe that the universe is a source of endless fascination and inspiration. Whether you're a seasoned astronomer or just someone who appreciates the majesty of the cosmos, we invite you to explore our site and discover all that it has to offer.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A realistic photograph of a galaxy cluster, with bright colors and intricate details that showcase the vastness of the universe."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
